Name: VR Darts
About the game: VR Darts is a virtual reality e-sports game for darts enthusiasts focused on realism. Play one of the following game types : 501, 301, Around the World. Play darts local against AI or your own best performance. Play darts against your friends or against darters all over the world using online multiplayer. Play darts in one of 2 locations : Dart Stand and Dart Cafe. Improve your throwing skills using our Training board or by a practise session (finishing or any game type). Compare yourself with others by ranking on our global leaderboards for rating (ELO based), 3 dart average, out percentage or number of darts thrown. Try to unlock all of our 60+ darts focused achievements. Configure your dart 'physics behaviour' to optimize your throwing experience. .... and you will hear a 'caller' that will call out your required numbers and hand scores ...
